name: Travis Jr.
tagline: An Android client for the popular hosted continuous integration service Travis-CI.
body: > **Travis Jr.** /'travis'jün-yər/ prop. noun. **1** A mobile client for [Travis-CI](http://travis-ci.org). **2** Follow personal or organizational repositories and view all recent builds.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
